mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T06_PER_HISTORY ( PER_ID , EVENT_TYPE , EVENT_DATE , EVENT_TIME , LATITUDE , LONGITUDE , TITLE , COVER_IMAGE , PRAISE , IS_PUBLIC , REMARKS , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{perID} , #{eventType} , #{eventDate} , #{eventTime} , #{latitude} , #{longitude} , #{title} , #{coverImage} , #{praise} , #{isPublic} , #{remarks} , #{createDate} , #{createTime} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T06_PER_HISTORY SET PER_ID = #{perID} , EVENT_TYPE = #{eventType} , EVENT_DATE = #{eventDate} , EVENT_TIME = #{eventTime} , LATITUDE = #{latitude} , LONGITUDE = #{longitude} , TITLE = #{title} , COVER_IMAGE = #{coverImage} , PRAISE = #{praise} , IS_PUBLIC = #{isPublic} , REMARKS = #{remarks} , CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} , CREATE_TIME = #{createTime} WHERE ID = #{iD}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "iD" , PER_ID AS "perID" , EVENT_TYPE AS "eventType" , EVENT_DATE AS "eventDate" , EVENT_TIME AS "eventTime" , LATITUDE AS "latitude" , LONGITUDE AS "longitude" , TITLE AS "title" , COVER_IMAGE AS "coverImage" , PRAISE AS "praise" , IS_PUBLIC AS "isPublic" , REMARKS AS "remarks" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" FROM T06_PER_HISTORY WHERE ID = #{iD}

SELECT ID AS "iD" , PER_ID AS "perID" , EVENT_TYPE AS "eventType" , EVENT_DATE AS "eventDate" , EVENT_TIME AS "eventTime" , LATITUDE AS "latitude" , LONGITUDE AS "longitude" , TITLE AS "title" , COVER_IMAGE AS "coverImage" , PRAISE AS "praise" , IS_PUBLIC AS "isPublic" , REMARKS AS "remarks" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" FROM T06_PER_HISTORY WHERE ID = #{iD} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "iD" , PER_ID AS "perID" , EVENT_TYPE AS "eventType" , EVENT_DATE AS "eventDate" , EVENT_TIME AS "eventTime" , LATITUDE AS "latitude" , LONGITUDE AS "longitude" , TITLE AS "title" , COVER_IMAGE AS "coverImage" , PRAISE AS "praise" , IS_PUBLIC AS "isPublic" , REMARKS AS "remarks" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" FROM T06_PER_HISTORY WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
